game_description: *OHSHAPE ULTIMATE* The fresh and definitive version of the popular rhythm game is here! With astonishing new visuals, more content, new environments and more! Take a look at these extra features: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è New super cool menu environment to choose your favorite songs from ü§è Freshly improved interface with a modern style üèØ New Asian environment for the third album üìñ The tutorial level now features a more pleasant flow for newcomers üéâ We prepared a small gift by adding two new songs and now the ‚ÄúElectro Party‚Äù DLC is available for all users for free! OhShape is a rhythm game offering a unique way of moving your whole body. Dodge obstacles, punch walls, and make fun poses to get through each map. Play with the coins and be the star of your own show! -Custom songs officially supported- Without realizing it, you'll be working out like you‚Äôve never done before, and you will just want more and more. Enjoy the feeling, and sweat it out! With 4 difficulty levels and a lot of gameplay settings, you can customize the experience to your skills. Remember, practice makes perfect! Key features ‚Ä¢ Fun and great workout for your whole body ‚Ä¢ 47 handcrafted songs with 4 difficulty levels ‚Ä¢ Party Mode: play and compete with your friends and family ‚Ä¢ Practice Mode: practice level sections to perfection! ‚Ä¢ Custom songs support with a very easy to use level editor ‚Ä¢ Cross-platform online leaderboard
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: ‚û°Ô∏è quest25.bio.link Get % Off for Quest Games ---- ‚û°Ô∏è My new Projekt: Deals24.net ‚¨ÖÔ∏è A Captivating Rhythm Workout - OhShape is a Brilliant VR Game! Review: OhShape is an extraordinary VR game that immediately captivated me with its unique rhythm workout and exhilarating music. As an avid VR player and fitness enthusiast, OhShape completely won me over with its creative challenges and engaging atmosphere. The gameplay of OhShape is simply brilliant. You move to captivating music while simultaneously dodging obstacles that come towards you in rhythm. The combination of rhythm and dexterity makes the game an exhilarating workout that provides both challenge and entertainment. The variety of music and choreographies in OhShape is impressive. From energetic pop hits to soothing melodies, the game offers a wide range of songs that cater to every musical taste. The carefully crafted choreographies perfectly match the music, creating a harmonious gaming experience. The graphics and design of OhShape are aesthetically appealing. The stylized environment and colorful obstacles create a vibrant game world that continues to delight. The intuitive control with the VR controllers allows you to fully focus on the movements and rhythm. Another plus of OhShape is its customizable difficulty. You can tailor the game to your own abilities and preferences, making the gaming experience accessible and challenging at the same time. This allows for personal growth and increases the motivation to improve constantly. OhShape is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a captivating and motivating rhythm workout. With its unique gameplay mechanics, variety of music and choreographies, and customizable difficulty, OhShape completely impressed me. If you're searching for a brilliant VR game that gets you dancing and moving, then OhShape is the perfect choice!
review_2: OhShape is the perfect game for me, I'm 25 and this is the perfect exercise level for me! But these last few updates are only damaging the game. The new crappy song pictures and the way the songs are organized now need to go. The game was perfect when I first got it! Please see this, you are only making your game look bad with the very poor google pictures! Your game looks so cheap now, and I know it isnt. I love this game! PS. New songs will always ALWAYS be a benefit, I WILL pay for DLC!! Just add them!
